body_html:
Thanks for your reply.
ubuntu16.04
tensorflow 1.7
no GPU
bazel 0.9

I use facenet model to do face recogonition, when i load model in main thread and do inference is ok，
but when i load model in mian thread and do inference in child thread，then is failed.

body:
Thanks for your reply.
ubuntu16.04
tensorflow 1.7
no GPU
bazel 0.9

I use facenet model to do face recogonition, when i load model in main thread and do inference is ok，
but when i load model in mian thread and  do inference in child thread，then is failed.
